== Cron jobs You can define cron jobs in your application. Via a cron job on th AppEngine you can access a URL according to a time pattern which is defined similar to the cron jobs on Unix. You define your cron jobs in a file "cron.xml" in the `WEB-INF` folder of you application.
Please note that you should avoid running unnecessary cron jobs as this increases the load of the AppEngine.
